keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The violence, which occurred in six separate episodes over 24 hours, may have been retribution for the arrest of militants, a police official said.

headline.main: Muslim Separatist Militants in Thailand Kill 6 Civilians
